::: {.callout-note title="Readings"}
The papers below provide guiding frameworks for the rest of this course, and chance is you'll have to read it a couple of times (e.g., first to get an overview, and later to appreciate and use the details in your project). 

- ["Fields of Gold: Scraping Web Data for Marketing Insights"](https://doi.org/10.1177/00222429221100750) 
- ["Unlocking the potential of web data for retailing research"](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jretai.2024.02.002)

Note: The web appendices contain valuable tables, so don't skip them.

:::
